Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small Loop Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small Loop AllSmallLoop is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic loop models from orders 2 to 7.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of Loop formulas(Loop).
x+(x*y)=y.
x*(x+y)=y.
0*x = x & x=x*0.
(y*x)^x = y.
(y^x)*x=y.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
